about_the_game:
Buy Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Imperial Edition and get:

  • Loyalist Pack: Purge heresy in style with these 4 unique class outfits, 8 weapon skin patterns, one set of headgear as well as an Ogryn body tattoo.
  • Mortis Veteran Portrait Frame: A cosmetic portrait frame used to pay tribute to the fallen defenders of Tertium Hive.
  • Caducades Backpack: A cosmetic backpack for human characters. Scavenged from the fallen troops of Cadia, this backpack has been repurposed to serve those still alive and fighting.
  • Official Soundtrack: BAFTA award winning composer Jesper Kyd creates this deeply atmospheric and adrenaline fueled soundtrack fit only for the grimdark world of Warhammer 40,000: Darktide.
  • 2500 Aquilas (premium currency)

content_descriptors.notes: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide features intense violence, blood and gore (including decapitation or dismemberment of zombie-like creatures).

detailed_description:
Buy Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Imperial Edition and get:

  • Loyalist Pack: Purge heresy in style with these 4 unique class outfits, 8 weapon skin patterns, one set of headgear as well as an Ogryn body tattoo.
  • Mortis Veteran Portrait Frame: A cosmetic portrait frame used to pay tribute to the fallen defenders of Tertium Hive.
  • Caducades Backpack: A cosmetic backpack for human characters. Scavenged from the fallen troops of Cadia, this backpack has been repurposed to serve those still alive and fighting.
  • Official Soundtrack: BAFTA award winning composer Jesper Kyd creates this deeply atmospheric and adrenaline fueled soundtrack fit only for the grimdark world of Warhammer 40,000: Darktide.
  • 2500 Aquilas (premium currency)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Imperial Edition Upgrade

short_description: Take back the city of Tertium Hive from hordes of bloodthirsty foes in this intense and brutal action shooter. Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is the new co-op focused experience from the award-winning team behind the Vermintide series.As Tertium falls, Rejects Will Rise.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
